instructions.title: Prepare the campsite
instructions.description: Choose a flat, dry area away from large tree branches. Clear any rocks or sticks that might damage the tent floor.

instructions.title: Set up the tent
instructions.description: Lay down the groundsheet first, then assemble the poles according to color codes. Stretch and secure the ropes at a 45-degree angle.

instructions.title: Use safely
instructions.description: Do not use open flames inside the tent. Ensure proper ventilation while sleeping. Regularly check and tighten the ropes.

instructions.title: Store after use
instructions.description: Dry completely before packing. Fold neatly as instructed to avoid damaging zippers or fabric.

instructions.title: Inflate or unroll
instructions.description: Lay the pad flat and inflate it manually or automatically depending on the model. Make sure the valve is tightly closed afterward.

instructions.title: Adjust firmness
instructions.description: Test the firmness and adjust air pressure for comfort. Avoid over-inflation which can damage the material.

instructions.title: Use properly
instructions.description: Place it under your sleeping bag for insulation. Avoid sharp objects or rough surfaces underneath.

instructions.title: Clean and store
instructions.description: Wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild soap. Let it dry completely before rolling and storing in a cool, dry place.

instructions.title: Prepare the area
instructions.description: Set up your cooking station on a stable, flat surface. Keep flammable items away from the stove.

instructions.title: Use safely
instructions.description: Always supervise the stove or fire while cooking. Use windshields when needed and handle hot cookware carefully.

instructions.title: Clean after cooking
instructions.description: Wash utensils and cookware with biodegradable soap and dry completely to prevent rust or mold.

instructions.title: Store properly
instructions.description: Pack cookware and utensils in clean bags or containers. Keep fuel canisters sealed and stored separately.

instructions.title: Pack efficiently
instructions.description: Place heavier items near your back and at the center of the pack. Keep frequently used items on top or in side pockets.

instructions.title: Adjust for comfort
instructions.description: Tighten shoulder straps and hip belts so the weight is evenly distributed. Avoid overloading.

instructions.title: Use with care
instructions.description: Avoid dragging the backpack on the ground. Protect it from excessive moisture and direct sunlight.

instructions.title: Clean and store
instructions.description: Empty all pockets, brush off dirt, and hand wash with mild soap. Air dry completely before storing in a cool, dry place.

instructions.title: Check power source
instructions.description: Ensure batteries are charged or replaced before use. For rechargeable lights, charge fully before the trip.

instructions.title: Use safely
instructions.description: Avoid pointing bright lights directly at eyes. Keep lanterns stable and away from flammable materials.

instructions.title: Maintain brightness
instructions.description: Clean lenses regularly and check bulb connections. Carry spare batteries or backup lighting.

instructions.title: Store properly
instructions.description: Turn off completely before storing. Keep in a dry, dust-free container to prevent corrosion.

instructions.title: Check filter or cartridge
instructions.description: Ensure the filter is clean and properly attached before use. Replace it according to the manufacturer’s schedule.

instructions.title: Use correctly
instructions.description: Follow the purification steps as directed—whether pumping, squeezing, or using UV light. Treat clear water whenever possible.

instructions.title: Clean after use
instructions.description: Flush clean water through the system after each use to prevent buildup or contamination.

instructions.title: Store properly
instructions.description: Dry completely before storing. Keep filters in a clean, sealed bag away from direct sunlight and moisture.
